verses.verse: An oracle <S%H5002><s%> is within <S%H7130><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> about the disobedience <S%H6588><s%> of the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> "There is no fear <S%H6343><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> before his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>"
For he flatters <S%H2505><s%> himself in his own eyes, <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5771><s%> too much to detect <S%H4672><s%> and hate his sin. <S%H8130><s%>
The words <S%H1697><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> are iniquity <S%H205><s%> and deceit. <S%H4820><s%> He has ceased <S%H2308><s%> to be wise <S%H7919><s%> and to do good. <S%H3190><s%>

He plots <S%H2803><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> on his bed. <S%H4904><s%> He sets <S%H3320><s%> himself in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good. <S%H2896><s%> He doesn't <S%H3988><s%> abhor evil. <S%H7451><s%>
Your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> is in the heavens. <S%H8064><s%> Your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> reaches to the skies. <S%H7834><s%>

Your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> is like the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of God. <S%H410><s%> Your judgments <S%H4941><s%> are like a great <S%H7227><s%> deep. <S%H8415><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you preserve <S%H3467><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and animal. <S%H929><s%>

How precious <S%H3368><s%> is your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> God! <S%H430><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> take refuge <S%H2620><s%> under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings. <S%H3671><s%>

They shall be abundantly satisfied <S%H7301><s%> with the abundance <S%H1880><s%> of your house. <S%H1004><s%> You will make them drink <S%H8248><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> of your pleasures. <S%H5730><s%>
For with you is the spring <S%H4726><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%> In your light <S%H216><s%> shall we see <S%H7200><s%> light. <S%H216><s%>
Oh continue <S%H4900><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> to those who know <S%H3045><s%> you, <S%H6666><s%> your righteousness to the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Don't <S%H7272><s%> let the foot of pride <S%H1346><s%> come <S%H935><s%> against me. <S%H3027><s%> Don't let the hand of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> drive me away. <S%H5110><s%>
There the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> are fallen. <S%H5307><s%> They are thrust down, <S%H1760><s%> and shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to rise. <S%H6965><s%>
